```{r}
#| label: fetchit

tmp <- tempfile(fileext = ".bib")

ans <- download.file(
  url = file_url,
  destfile = tmp
)

stopifnot(ans == 0)

ans <- file.copy(from = tmp, to = "papers.bib")
```
